content: body round 2 *k2 p2 k2 p1 m1p p1 k2 p2 rli k2 lli p2 k2 p1 m1p p1* repeat 120 st round 3 + all odd rounds through 27 knit in established pattern knit the knits and purl the purls round 4 *k2 rounds 8-19 two more times three times total crown round 20 *k2 p2 k2 p4 c4f p2 c4f p4* repeat 120 st round 22 *k1 ssk k2tog k1 p3 c3bp c3fp c3bp c3fp p3* repeat 110 st round 24 *ssk k2tog p2 c3bp p2 c4b p2 c3fp p2* repeat 100 st round 26 *k2 p2tog k2 p3 k4 p3 k2 p2tog* repeat 90 st round 28 *k2 p1 k1 ssk p2 c4b p2 k2tog k1 p1* repeat 80 st round 29 *k2 p1 k1 ssk p1 k4 p1 k2tog k1 p1* repeat 70 st round 30 *k2 p1 k1 ssk k4 k2tog k1 p1* repeat 60 st round 31 *k2 p1 k1 ssk k2 k2tog k1 p1* repeat 50 st round 32 *k2 p1 k1 ssk k2tog k1 p1* repeat 40 st round 33 *k2 p1 ssk k2tog p1* repeat 30 st round 34 *k2tog p1 k2tog p1* repeat 20 st round 35 *ssk ssk* repeat 10 st cut the yarn leaving an 8-inch tail and thread it through the last 10 stitches twice abbreviations k knit p purl st stitch es round round cn cable needle k2tog knit two together p2tog purl two together ssk slip slip knit slip 2 st knitwise return to left needle knit 2 together through back loops m1p make 1 purl right rli right lifted increase lli left lifted increase c4b cable 4 back slip 2 st onto cn hold to back k2 k2 from cn c4f cable 4 front slip 2 st onto cn hold to front k2 k2 from cn c3bp cable 3 back purl slip
